TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebErrorEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebBaseErrorEvent

summary.span: 提供有关系统错误的信息。

span.span: Provides information about systemic errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 提供由配置或应用程序代码问题引起的错误有关的信息。The provides information about errors caused by problems with configuration or application code. 一个示例是在网页中发现错误时由 ASP.NET 发出错误。An example is the error issued by ASP.NET when an error is found in a page. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. 也显示摘自使 ASP.NET 可以使用此自定义事件的配置文件。Also shown is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use this custom event. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/CS/weberrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/VB/weberrorevent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 进行调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 你可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义此构造函数。The following code example shows how to customize this constructor.
